plot: Lydia, a traumatised refugee, has fled to London from Bosnia. Unfortunately, her brother is a war criminal on the run. Men who are after him track her down to get him to come out of hiding.
title: Inside Outside Lydia's Head
plot_es: Lydia, a traumatised refugee, has fled to London from Bosnia. Unfortunately, her brother is a war criminal on the run. Men who are after him track her down to get him to come out of hiding.
plot_en: Lydia, a traumatised refugee, has fled to London from Bosnia. Unfortunately, her brother is a war criminal on the run. Men who are after him track her down to get him to come out of hiding.
